message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it to me for $95?
I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $95. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $105.
I see, Alice. Thank you for your response. I'm still committed to staying within my budget. Could you possibly lower the price to $100?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to sell it to you for $100. I'm willing to sell it to you for $108, which is the lowest I can go without losing money on the deal.
